overview: When a bunch of good-looking strangers are picked to live together in relative luxury, as they do in MTV's reality show "The Real World," love, or lust, is bound to happen on- and off-camera; witness the series' best and most notorious couplings. Covering the show's entire 13-year run, this riveting and more-than-slightly intrusive "documentary" contains plenty of juicy highlights.
title: MTV: The Real World: Hook-Ups
